com.pega.pegarules.pub.generator

Interface PRObjectWrapperGenerator


  • public interface PRObjectWrapperGenerator
    PRObjectWrapperGenerator provides the interface for standard java page wrapper generators. All access to wrappers should be made via the PRObjectWrapperGenerator class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double COMPAT_42SP1 
      static double COMPAT_42SP2 
      static java.lang.String PRPC_WRAPPER_PACKAGE
      Last component of the package name for wrappers we will generate.
      static java.lang.String VERSION

      • wrapperNameFromType

        java.lang.String wrapperNameFromType(java.lang.Class type)
        Given a java type, return the wrapper name.
        Parameters:
        type - type to be wrapped
        Returns:
        the name of the associated wrapper

      • setDesignTime

        void setDesignTime(boolean designTime)
        Set flag to indicate that this generation is taking place at design time. When the design time flag is set, generator should also build the schema matching the bean structure for use in the accelerators. The schema will be accessed with the "getSchema" method following a call to "generateWrapper".
        Parameters:
        designTime - true if we are in design time, false otherwise.

      • getDesignTime

        boolean getDesignTime()
        Get the current value of the design time flag.
        Returns:
        true if we are in design time, false otherwise.

      • getSchema

        java.lang.String getSchema()
        Get the associated schema document. The document should be available at design time after a call to generateWrapps a design time
        Returns:
        the matching schema document

      • generateWrapper

        java.lang.Class generateWrapper(java.lang.String wrapperClassName)
                         throws PRObjectWrapperException
        Generate the specified wrapper. This generator should only attempt to generate wrappers it identifies as one that it generated. This allows wrappers to be modified without being overwritten.
        Parameters:
        wrapperClassName -
        Returns:
        Class object for the specified wrapper.
        Throws:
        PRObjectWrapperException - if the wrapper should not be generated.

      • generateWrapper

        java.lang.Class generateWrapper(java.lang.String wrapperClassName,
                                java.util.List userSelectedProperties)
                         throws PRObjectWrapperException
        Generate the specified wrapper, only include properties listed.
        Parameters:
        wrapperClassName - Names of the wrapper class to generate.
        userSelectedProperties - Names of the properties we are interested in.
        Returns:
        Class object for the specified wrapper.
        Throws:
        PRObjectWrapperException
